steps.criteria: [NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.
[NPC] Weaponsmith: You'll need some strong weapons to survive out in the wild! Lucky for you, I've got some!
[NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!

steps.instruction:
Buy Oak Logs &b%1%&r
Buy Sticks &b%2%&r
Buy Wooden Swords &b%3%&r
Buy Wooden Shovel &b%4%&r

Buy Experience Bottle &b%1%&r
&cSave for experimentation table

Enchant items
&eGet splashed with grands
&eOR
&e1. Swap to main profile
&e2. Join a hub-selector hub
&e3. Throw a titanic in a corner
&e4. Collect xp on bingo profile

steps.criteria: [NPC] Jerry: Your SkyBlock island is part of a much larger universe.

steps.instruction:
Do 1st superpairs
&7(Try to get Grand Experience Bottle)

Do 2nd superpairs
&7(Try to get Grand Experience Bottle)

Do 3rd superpairs
&7(Try to get Grand Experience Bottle)

steps.criteria: [NPC] Bramass Beastslayer: Hello, adventurer! I am Bramass Beastslayer! I've slain beasts of all sorts across SkyBlock!
[NPC] Grandma Wolf: I've added the Grandma Wolf Pet to your Pets Menu.
[NPC] Michael: Go talk to him if you want to learn more!
[NPC] Ike: Talk to me again if you want to check your progress!

steps.instruction:
Get Raw Porkchop &b%1%&r
Get Leather &b%2%&r
Get Egg &b%3%&r

Add Jerry to Pet Menu
&7(Hold item & Right-Click)
steps.criteria: Successfully added Jerry to your pet menu!

steps.instruction:
Unlock Mushroom Collection 2
&7(Use Silk-Touch Axe on Huge Mushrooms)

Place Pig Minion
&cDon't forget a storage!
Apply Black Diamond to Golden Pickaxe
Apply Black Diamond to Golden Pickaxe
Apply Black Diamond to Golden Pickaxe

Get Enchanted Coal &b%1%&r
&7(Chop Logs, Trade for Coal)

Give Rhys Enchanted Coal
&c/warp mines if stuck

steps.criteria: [NPC] Fetchur: thanks thats probably what i needed
[NPC] Puzzler: Nice!  Here, have some Mithril Powder!

steps.has: You don't have enough Mithril Powder!

steps.instruction:
Find and kill a Star Sentry
&eAsk in chat and lobby-hop if necessary.
Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe

Get Ender Helmet &b%1%&r
Get Ender Chestplate &b%2%&r
Get Ender Leggings &b%3%&r
Get Ender Boots &b%4%&r

Unlock Combat 15
&7(Mine nodes & kill Nest Mites too)

Store Talisman
&7(Accessory Bag or Ender Chest)
